name: Mimino
summary_text: Local Georgian pilot Mimino dreams of flying airplanes for major international airlines. To realize his aspirations, he goes to Moscow where he encounters a fellow comrade from the Caucasus, the Armenian Rubik. Many misadventures ensue.

name: Preservation
summary_text: An anesthesiologist must awaken her animal instincts when she, her husband and her brother-in-law become the quarry of unseen hunters who want to turn them all into trophies.

name: The 101-Year-Old Man Who Skipped Out on the Bill and Disappeared
summary_text: The 101 year old man Allan Karlsson goes through Europe in search for a Russian soda recipe he lost during the early 70s. Unfortunately, he is not the only one who is looking for it.

name: September 11
summary_text: The effects of the 9/11 terrorist attacks are told from different points of view around the world.

name: Caravaggio
summary_text: A retelling of the life of the celebrated 17th-century painter through his brilliant, nearly blasphemous paintings and his flirtations with the underworld.

name: Babysitting 2
summary_text: Franck and his girlfriend Sonya, plus some of their friends go on holiday in Brasil. Franck, his friends, two girls and Sonya's grandmother leave to visit a cave, but everything goes wrong and their crazy adventures begin.

name: Barney Thomson
summary_text: Barney Thomson (Robert Carlyle), awkward, diffident, Glasgow, Scotland barber, lives a life of desperate mediocrity and his uninteresting life is about to go from 0 to 60 in five seconds, as he enters the grotesque and comically absurd world of the serial killer.

name: Io e te
summary_text: An introverted teenager tells his parents he is going on a ski trip, but instead spends his time alone in a basement.

name: Underclassman
summary_text: A young detective goes undercover at an elite private school to destroy an international stolen car ring.

name: Daawat-e-Ishq
summary_text: A story of Gullu, a Hyderabadi girl frustrated with dowry-seeking men and Taru (a charming Lucknawi cook), who crush old-fashioned world-view.

name: SAS: Red Notice
summary_text: A small army of well trained criminals led by Grace Lewis have hijacked a train deep beneath the English Channel.

name: Anthropophagus: The Grim Reaper
summary_text: A group of friends and a hitchhiker become stranded on a tourist island where they are stalked by a disfigured cannibalistic killer who is prowling the island after killing its residents.

name: Warsaw '44
summary_text: A story of love, friendship and the pursuit of adventure during the bloody and brutal reality of the 1944 Warsaw Uprising.

name: Vincent will Meer
summary_text: A young man suffering from Tourette's syndrome absconds from an institution with two other inhabitants to travel to Italy to fulfill his mother's last wish.

name: Peyton Place
summary_text: A peaceful New England town hides secrets and scandals.

name: Three Times
summary_text: Three stories set in three times, 1911, 1966 and 2005. Two actors play the two main characters in each story.

name: Spacehunter: Adventures in the Forbidden Zone
summary_text: On a distant planet inhabited by mutants, two bounty-hunters race to rescue three Earth female captives from the clutches of an evil mutant warlord.

name: Der müde Tod
summary_text: When a woman's fiancé disappears, Death gives her three chances to save him from his fate.

name: To Save a Life
summary_text: After a childhood friend's death, Jake Taylor, an all-star athlete must change his life - and sacrifice his dreams to save the lives of others.

name: The White Crow
summary_text: The story of Rudolf Nureyev's defection to the West.

name: Seoul Station
summary_text: Several groups of people try to survive a zombie pandemic that unleashes itself in downtown Seoul.

name: A Christmas Prince: The Royal Baby
summary_text: It's Christmastime in Aldovia, and a royal baby is on the way. Amber and Richard host royals from a distant kingdom to renew a sacred truce, but when the treaty vanishes, peace is jeopardized and an ancient curse threatens their family.

name: The Human Condition II: Road to Eternity
summary_text: As a conscript in war-time Japan's military, a pacifist struggles to maintain his determination to keep his ideals.

name: Two If by Sea
summary_text: A couple steals a Matisse painting on contract. They manage to escape the police. The sale takes place 4 days later on an island. Things don't go as planned.

name: Crooks in Clover
summary_text: A dying mob boss hands over his business to an old friend, Fernand. The boss' assistants want to get rid of the latter. But are the Volfoni brothers and Théo real threats? Ensuing fights and shootouts are more comical than deadly.

name: Detour
summary_text: A young law student blindly enters into a pact with a hoodlum who offers to kill his stepfather - a man he feels is responsible for the accident that sent his mother into a coma.

name: Special
summary_text: A lonely comic book fan, Les Franken, has a reaction to medication and becomes convinced he's a superhero.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Bojack Unbound
summary_text: Bojack is a demon who was freed from prison when King Kai's planet was destroyed. Now, without his father Goku by his side, can Gohan save the Earth?

name: The Great Waldo Pepper
summary_text: After WW1, an ex-pilot takes up barn-storming and chance-meets a former German ace fighter pilot with whom he co-stars in Hollywood war movies depicting aerial dog-fights.

name: The Train Robbers
summary_text: A gunhand named Lane is hired by a widow, Mrs. Lowe, to find gold stolen by her husband so that she may return it and start fresh.

name: The Razor's Edge
summary_text: An adventuresome young man goes off to find himself and loses his socialite fiancée in the process. But when he returns 10 years later, she will stop at nothing to get him back, even though she is already married.

name: Eegah
summary_text: Teenagers stumble across a prehistoric caveman, who goes on a rampage.

name: Flesh for Frankenstein
summary_text: Baron Frankenstein creates two "zombies" - one male, one female - planning to mate them in order to create a master race.

name: The Attorney
summary_text: An ambitious tax attorney decides to represent an old friend in court.

name: Dorothy Mills
summary_text: A psychiatrist is assigned to work on the case of a disturbed young girl.

name: The Adventures of Pinocchio
summary_text: One of puppet-maker Geppetto's creations comes magically to life. This puppet named Pinocchio has one major desire, to become a real boy someday, but he has to learn to act responsibly.

name: Hum Hain Rahi Pyar Ke
summary_text: Rahul Malhotra (Aamir Khan) is the manager of the heavily in debt family business. He is also the guardian of his dead sister's mischievous kids. Rahul hires Vaijayanti (Juhi Chawla) as ...                See full summary »

name: The High and the Mighty
summary_text: When a commercial airliner develops engine problems on a trans-Pacific flight and the pilot loses his nerve, it is up to the washed-up co-pilot Dan Roman to bring the plane in safely.

name: Bloodsucking Freaks
summary_text: Sardu, master of the Theatre of the Macabre, and his assistant Ralphus run a show in which, under the guise of 'magic', they torture and murder people in front of their audience. But what the spectators see as a trick is actually real.

name: Her Smell
summary_text: A self-destructive punk rocker struggles with sobriety while trying to recapture the creative inspiration that led her band to success.

name: Exeter
summary_text: A group of teenagers accidentally release an evil spirit that starts to possess them one by one.

name: Estômago
summary_text: In the great restaurant of life, there are those who eat and those who get eaten. Raimundo Nonato finds an alternative way, a life of his own: he cooks in order to survive and find a place ...                See full summary »

name: Slap Her, She's French!
summary_text: A French foreign-exchange student comes to a small Texas high school, befriends a classmate, and practically takes over her life.

name: Moon Over Parador
summary_text: A US actor gets a gig in South American Parador. When the dictator dies, he's forced to play him for real and gets his mistress. Can they change Parador?

name: Sudden Fear
summary_text: After an ambitious actor insinuates himself into the life of a wealthy middle-aged playwright and marries her, he plots with his mistress to murder her.

name: Hamari Adhuri Kahani
summary_text: A single mother finds solace with a wealthy, but lonely hotel magnate, together they find love until her past comes back to confront her.

name: Reality
summary_text: A wanna-be director is given 48 hours by a producer to find the best groan of pain, worthy of an Oscar, as the only condition to back his film.

name: Jerry Seinfeld: 'I'm Telling You for the Last Time'
summary_text: Live from New York City, Jerry Seinfeld, aided and abetted by a host of friends and fellow comedians, performs his 1998 Emmy-nominated performance on Broadway.

name: The MatchMaker
summary_text: Marcy is an assistant to Senator John McGlory, who is having problems with a re-election campaign. Desperate for Irish votes, McGlory's chief of staff Nick sends Marcy to Ireland to trace ...                See full summary »

name: 3 Ninjas: Knuckle Up
summary_text: Rocky, Colt and Tum Tum are back in an all new adventure everyone will fall for.

name: Am zin
summary_text: Police inspector and excellent hostage negotiator Ho Sheung-Sang finds himself in over his head when he is pulled into a 72 hour game by a cancer suffering criminal out for vengeance on Hong Kong's organized crime Syndicates.

name: I cento passi
summary_text: "I cento passi" (one hundred steps) was the distance between the Impastatos' house and the house of Tano Badalamenti, an important Mafia boss, in the small Sicilian town of Cinisi. The ...                See full summary »

name: My First Mister
summary_text: A 17-year-old girl has a troubled relationship with a 49-year-old man.

name: Nieve negra
summary_text: Accused of killing his brother during adolescence, Salvador lives alone in the middle of Patagonia. Several decades later, his brother Marcos and his sister-in-law Laura, come to convince him to sell the lands they share by inheritance.

name: Wise Guys
summary_text: Harry Valentini and Moe Dickstein are both errand boys for the Mob. When they lose two hundred fifty thousand dollars, they are set up to kill each other. But they run off to Atlantic City, and comedy follows.

name: Whisky Galore!
summary_text: Scottish islanders try to plunder 50,000 cases of whisky from a stranded ship.

name: The Baby-Sitters Club
summary_text: Seven junior-high-school girls organize a daycare camp for children while at the same time experiencing classic adolescent growing pains.

name: Gambit
summary_text: An English cat burglar needs a Eurasian dancer's help to pull off the perfect heist, but even the most foolproof schemes have a way of backfiring.

name: Wer früher stirbt, ist länger tot
summary_text: Marcus H. Rosenmüller's first feature movie deals with a boy thinking that he is responsible for his mother's death and his unusual way to fight his feelings of guilt. 11-year-old Sebastian...                See full summary »

name: Mortuary
summary_text: A family moves to a small town in California where they plan on starting a new life while running a long-abandoned funeral home. The locals fear the place, which is suspected to be on haunted ground.

name: The Yearling
summary_text: A boy persuades his parents to allow him to adopt a young deer, but what will happen if the deer misbehaves?

name: Keep the Lights On
summary_text: In Manhattan, film-maker Erik bonds with closeted lawyer Paul after a fling. As their relationship becomes one fueled by highs, lows, and dysfunctional patterns, Erik struggles to negotiate his own boundaries while being true to himself.

name: Fando and Lis
summary_text: Fando and his partially paralyzed lover Lis search for the mythical city of Tar. Based on Jodorowsky's memories of a play by surrealist Fernando Arrabal.

name: 8 x 10 Tasveer
summary_text: A forest ranger with the ability to visit the past by looking at photographs attempts to solve the mystery behind his father's sudden death.

name: Elena Undone
summary_text: Fate brings two diversely different women together, and sets them on a collision course that will shatter their preconceived notions about love, life and the power of one's soul.

name: Nazarin
summary_text: A priest in a poor community lives a charitable life in accordance with his religious principles, but many others do not return the favor.

name: Thirty Seconds Over Tokyo
summary_text: In the wake of Pearl Harbor, a young lieutenant leaves his expectant wife to volunteer for a secret bombing mission which will take the war to the Japanese homeland.

name: 7 Boxes
summary_text: Víctor receives an unusual proposal, to carry 7 boxes of unknown content through the Market Number 4 but things get complicated along the way.

name: Günesin Oglu
summary_text: People's souls changes. Souls pass when someone dies.

name: Stolen
summary_text: A detective deals with the loss of his own son while trying to uncover the identity of a boy whose mummified remains are found in a box buried for fifty years.

name: Bang the Drum Slowly
summary_text: The story of the friendship between a star pitcher, wise to the world, and a half-wit catcher, as they cope with the catcher's terminal illness through a baseball season.

name: Deep End
summary_text: 15-year-old dropout Mike takes a job at Newford Baths, where inappropriate sexual behaviour abounds, and becomes obsessed with his coworker Susan.

name: A Little Romance
summary_text: An American teenager living in Paris meets and falls in love with a local.

name: The Head Hunter
summary_text: A medieval warrior's gruesome collection of heads is missing only one - the monster that killed his daughter years ago.

name: Seethamma Vakitlo Sirimalle Chettu
summary_text: An exuberant and evocative family drama, that primarily revolves around the close bond between two brothers with radically different personalities, highlighting the complex process of choosing an ideal life partner for each of them.

name: The Other Side of the Bed
summary_text: Two couples entwine on their search for love.

name: Air Bud: Golden Receiver
summary_text: Story of a golden retriever who can play football.

name: Sinners and Saints
summary_text: Two New Orleans cops are up against an extremely violent gang.

name: Everlasting Moments
summary_text: In a time of social change and unrest, war and poverty, a young working class woman, Maria, wins a camera in a lottery. The decision to keep it alters her whole life.

name: Junior Bonner
summary_text: Ace Bonner returns to Arizona several years after he abandoned his family, Junior Bonner is a wild young man. Against the typical rodeo championship, family drama erupts.

name: Blackbeard's Ghost
summary_text: On the Carolina coast, Godolphin College's new track coach lodges at Blackbeard's Inn, run by the Daughters of the Buccaneers, who claim to be descendants of the notorious pirate, and who risk losing their hotel to the local mobster.

name: Werner - Beinhart!
summary_text: Broesel has to make a Werner animation film but right now he has no real ideas for new stories. Thus he simply draws some stories from Werner's youth.

name: Él
summary_text: A husband's suave exterior unravels after his marriage, and he unleashes his paranoid and volatile temper on his wife, which escalates to more dangerous and unpredictable tantrums.

name: Move Over, Darling
summary_text: After having been lost at sea for several years, a missing wife thought long dead returns just after her husband has remarried.

name: Thunderpants
summary_text: An 11-year-old boy's amazing ability to break wind leads him first to fame and then to death row, before it helps him to fulfill his ambition of becoming an astronaut.

name: Hoi-sa-won
summary_text: When a change of heart moves a well-trained hitman to tender his resignation to his employers, no good comes of it for anyone.

name: Tou ze
summary_text: After suffering a stroke, an altruistic maid announces that she wants to quit her job and move into an old people's home.

name: Summer Interlude
summary_text: A lonely woman recalls her first love thirteen years prior during a brief summer vacation.

name: Friendship!
summary_text: A young man from East Germany travels to San Francisco to search for his father, who fled 12 years ago.

name: Mega Piranha
summary_text: A mutant strain of giant ferocious piranha escape from the Amazon and eat their way toward Florida.

name: Taste the Blood of Dracula
summary_text: Three distinguished English gentlemen accidentally resurrect Count Dracula, killing a disciple of his in process. The Count seeks to avenge his dead servant, by making the trio die in the hands of their own children.

name: Saint Laurent
summary_text: Yves Saint Laurent's life from 1967 to 1976, during which time the famed fashion designer was at the peak of his career.

name: My Science Project
summary_text: A high school student and his friend find a strange, orb-like piece of equipment to use as a science project, but must stop it when it begins to threaten mankind.

name: Godzilla vs. Megalon
summary_text: The undersea nation of Seatopia sends the gigantic Megalon to destroy the world above - and it's up to Godzilla and a size-shifting robot, Jet Jaguar, to defeat him.

name: Army of One
summary_text: A framed prison escapee unknowingly kidnaps a female cop en-route to a rendezvous with the corrupt cop who put him behind bars.

name: Desert Hearts
summary_text: While waiting for her divorce papers, a repressed professor of literature is unexpectedly seduced by a carefree, spirited young lesbian.

name: Slaughter High
summary_text: Eight people are invited to their old high school for their ten-year reunion where a fellow former student, disfigured from a prank gone wrong, is out to seek revenge.

name: Against the Sun
summary_text: A WWII pilot, bombardier, and radioman find themselves adrift on a lifeboat without food or water after being forced to ditch their plane during a scouting mission.

name: Strawberry and Chocolate
summary_text: This Oscar nominated film is the story of two men who are opposites, one gay, the other straight, one a fierce communist, the other a fierce individualist, one suspicious, the other accepting, and how they come to love each other.

name: Tito i ja
summary_text: A 10-year-old boy goes through variety of silly situations and confusions during the peak of Marshal Tito's cult of personality in 1950's Yugoslavia.

name: Squirm
summary_text: A storm causes some power lines to break and touch the ground, drawing millions of man-eating worms out of the earth, and into town where they quickly start munching on the locals.

name: Best of the Best II
summary_text: The Colosseum is the fighting arena owned by the champion Bracus. Now after the death of their friend, Rhee and Roberts want revenge.

name: La zona
summary_text: Residents of an enclosed neighborhood in the middle of Mexico DF are shocked by a violent crime, and for one resident in particular, young Alejandro, the drama is ratcheted up when he encounters the lone kid who escaped the event and is hiding out within the neighborhood's borders.

name: Small Change
summary_text: The lives of a motherless boy, who is just starting to get interested in women, and his physically abused friend, who lives in poverty, are mixed with more or less innocent childhood experiences and challenges of a number of children.

name: The Heist of the Century
summary_text: In 2006, a group of thieves performed what is considered one of the most famous and smart bank heists in the history of Argentina when they rob the Banco Río branch in Acassuso.

name: The Beach House
summary_text: A romantic getaway for two troubled college sweethearts turns into a struggle for survival when unexpected guests - and the surrounding environment - exhibit signs of a mysterious infection.

name: The League of Gentlemen's Apocalypse
summary_text: The notorious fictional town of Royston Vasey is under threat and its inhabitants are forced to leave.

name: Azumi 2: Death or Love
summary_text: Young assassins Azumi and Nagara continue their mission to prevent a civil war. In their hunt for Masayuki Sanada, who is protected by both an army and a dangerous clan, they meet Ginkaku, ...                See full summary »

name: The Gorgon
summary_text: In the early twentieth century, a Gorgon takes human form and terrorizes a small European village by turning its citizens to stone.

name: The Lost Valentine
summary_text: Lucas Thomas's grandmother Caroline returns every Valentine's Day to the station where, at their then first wedding anniversary, she waved off to the Pacific war theatre in 1944. Naval ...                See full summary »

name: The Backwoods
summary_text: An English couple's holiday in Spain is interrupted when they discover a girl imprisoned in a cabin.

name: Operation Cicero
summary_text: Ilyas Bazna works as a butler in the British Embassy in Turkey during WW2. After Bazna starts to work as a German spy he is going to experience a series of unexpected events.

name: Crown Vic
summary_text: Follows one memorable night in the life of LAPD officer Ray Mandel while hunting two cop killers on the loose.

name: Grilled
summary_text: A couple of incompetent door-to-door meat salesmen have fallen so far behind on their quotas that they are finally issued an ultimatum.

name: Run Ronnie Run
summary_text: A redneck with an uncanny knack for getting arrested becomes the star of his own reality program.

name: Sukai kurora
summary_text: The Kildren, a group of eternally young fighter pilots, experience the sudden loss of innocence as they battle the enemy in astonishing dogfights above the clouds.

name: Box of Moonlight
summary_text: An engineer finds his first gray hair, takes 6 days off from wife, son and work, rents a car and meets different people.

name: Ship of Fools
summary_text: A varied group of passengers boarding a ship bound for pre-WWII Germany represents a microcosm of early 1930s society.

name: The Bubble
summary_text: The movie follows a group of young friends in the city of Tel Aviv and is as much a love song to the city as it is an exploration of the claim that people in Tel Aviv are isolated from the ...                See full summary »

name: The New Legend of Shaolin
summary_text: It takes a father and son team to battle the forces of evil throughout China, fighting with honor to defend the weak through fast-motion kung fu.

name: Another Me
summary_text: A teenager finds her perfect life upended when she's stalked by a mysterious doppelganger who has her eyes set on assuming her identity.

name: Doctor Detroit
summary_text: A pimp on the run trusts his sex workers to a meek professor of literature, who accepts the challenge.

name: Jamesy Boy
summary_text: A young gang member turns his life around in prison, thanks to the friendship he forms with a convicted murderer who becomes his mentor.

name: Lola
summary_text: A seductive cabaret singer-prostitute pits a corrupt building contractor against the new straight-arrow building commissioner, launching an outrageous plan to elevate herself in a world where everything-and everyone-is for sale.

name: Buck Rogers in the 25th Century
summary_text: A 20th century astronaut emerges out of 500 years of suspended animation into a future time where Earth is threatened by alien invaders.

name: Villmark
summary_text: 5 Norwegians head for a cabin in the wilderness for a few days of team building. But strange things start happening - especially down by the water where they find an abandoned tent. Is there someone else?

name: Emma
summary_text: Faithful, enchanting adaptation of Jane Austen's nineteenth-century tale of Emma Woodhouse--a clever young woman whose mischievous matchmaking schemes nearly end up jeopardizing her own shot at romance.

name: Love Streams
summary_text: Two closely bound, emotionally wounded souls reunite after years apart.

name: Fox and His Friends
summary_text: A suggestible working-class innocent wins the lottery but lets himself be taken advantage of by his bourgeois new boyfriend and his circle of materialistic friends.

name: The Hollow Point
summary_text: A new sheriff of a small town along the U.S. & Mexico border investigates a drug cartel deal that went horribly wrong.

name: Tombs of the Blind Dead
summary_text: In the 13th century there existed a legion of evil knights known as the Templars, who quested for eternal life by drinking human blood and committing sacrifices. Executed for their unholy ...                See full summary »

name: Thank You
summary_text: Three wives engage the services of a private investigator after they suspect their respective husbands of infidelity.

name: School of Life
summary_text: A new teacher squares off against his crusty competitor for a teacher of the year award.

name: The Little Fox
summary_text: Famous, great hunters, better stay away, here comes Vuk! (They say he is cunning as a fox!)

name: 10,000 Saints
summary_text: Set in the 1980s, a teenager from Vermont moves to New York City to live with his father in East Village.

name: Bread and Roses
summary_text: Two Latina sisters work as cleaners in a downtown office building, and fight for the right to unionize.

name: Black Moon Rising
summary_text: A thief, Quint, is hired by the Justice Department to steal incriminating tapes from a corrupt corporation. The tapes vanish when Quint hides them in the back of a hydrodynamic powered racing car that is stolen by a hot car ring.

name: Two Much
summary_text: A young gallerist is in love with two sisters at the same time. In order to solve the problem he decides to invent his own twin-brother.

name: Thieves' Highway
summary_text: A war veteran turned truck driver attempts to avenge the crippling and robbing of his father at the hands of an amoral produce scofflaw.

name: Extreme Ops
summary_text: While filming an advertisement, some extreme sports enthusiasts unwittingly stop a group of terrorists.

name: Mute Witness
summary_text: A mute make-up artist working on a slasher movie being shot in Moscow, is locked in the studio after hours. While there, she witnesses a brutal murder, and must escape capture.

name: Il Bidone
summary_text: A trio of con-men led by a lonesome swindler must deal with their job and family pressures.

name: Capsule
summary_text: After years of flying fighter planes and 5 years as test pilot, Guy is now, Dec. 4, 1959, on a secret British space capsule orbiting Earth trying to reenter but things start going wrong. Can he, despite cold war, get back to Earth safely?

name: Eorin shinbu
summary_text: A teenage girl tries to continue her normal social and school life, after her grandfather forces her into an arranged marriage with a man in his twenties.

name: Vincere
summary_text: The story of Mussolini's secret lover, Ida Dalser, and their son Albino.

name: Hibernatus
summary_text: A rich businessman faces a quite weird problem - his wife's grandfather has been revived thanks to science. But he is not aware that many decades have passed.

name: Were the World Mine
summary_text: A bullied and demoralized gay student at an all-boys school uses a magical flower derived from Shakespeare's "A Midsummer Night's Dream' to turn many in his community gay, including a comely rugby player for himself.

name: The Ruthless
summary_text: A rebellious teenager grows up to become one of Milan's most ambitious criminals during the golden years of the 'ndrangheta' Mafia in the 1980s.

name: Green Street 3: Never Back Down
summary_text: An old firm leader returns to Green Street for revenge after receiving a call that his little brother was killed, but is he able to cope with a new type of hooliganism and can he find his killer?

name: Godzilla vs. Biollante
summary_text: Desolate by the loss of his daughter, a geneticist creates a monstrous new mutation.

name: Babylon 5: A Call to Arms
summary_text: The Drakh, allies of the Shadows, seek revenge against humanity after the Second Shadow War.

name: I Am Dina
summary_text: Dina grows up in a village at a fjord in 1860s north Norway. As child, she accidentally kills her mom and loses her rich dad's love. She grows up to be a clever, pretty, wild and strange woman. She marries a rich Frenchman.

name: The Hindenburg
summary_text: A film that chronicles the events of the Hindenburg disaster in which a zeppelin burst into flames.

name: The Owners
summary_text: A group of friends think they find an easy score at an empty house with a safe full of cash. But when the owners, an elderly couple, come home early, the tables are suddenly turned.

name: Love at First Bite
summary_text: This vampire spoof has Count Dracula moving to New York to find his Bride, after being forced to move out of his Transylvanian castle. There with the aid of assistant Renfield, he stumbles ...                See full summary »

name: Never on Sunday
summary_text: An American scholar in Greece sets about improving the prostitute with whom he is infatuated.

name: Stephanie
summary_text: After a mysterious global crisis, a young girl is left alone to hide from a malevolent power that stalks her home. Her parents eventually return and the struggle begins to save their daughter.

name: Kickboxer 2: The Road Back
summary_text: David's brother, Kurt, defeats Po in Kickboxer (1989). A year after Po kills Kurt, David, who has a kickboxing gym in LA, is manipulated into a match against Po.

name: Killers Anonymous
summary_text: A support group of killers is held regularly. The participants sit in a circle of trust and share their transgressions.

name: Angel and the Badman
summary_text: Quirt Evans, an all round bad guy, is nursed back to health and sought after by Penelope Worth, a Quaker girl. He eventually finds himself having to choose between his world and the world Penelope lives in.

name: Wild Reeds
summary_text: The fates of two homosexual partners are divided.

name: Brighton Rock
summary_text: In Brighton in 1935, small-time gang leader Pinkie Brown murders a journalist and later desperately tries to cover his tracks but runs into trouble with the police, a few witnesses and a rival gang.

name: Dead in a Week Or Your Money Back
summary_text: After his ninth unsuccessful attempt on his own life, a young man outsources his suicide to an ageing assassin. "If you're serious about ending it, you need professional help"

name: Renoir
summary_text: Set on the French Riviera in the summer of 1915, Jean Renoir -- son of the Impressionist painter, Pierre-Auguste -- returns home to convalesce after being wounded in World War I. At his ...                See full summary »

name: The Bridges at Toko-Ri
summary_text: Set during the Korean War, a Navy fighter pilot must come to terms with with his own ambivalence towards the war and the fear of having to bomb a set of highly defended bridges. The ending of this grim war drama is all tension.

name: The Door
summary_text: A successful artist loses control of his life after his young daughter's death. A chance for a new start appears, but all is not what it seems.

name: Les traducteurs
summary_text: Nine translators, hired to translate the eagerly awaited final book of a bestselling trilogy, are confined in a luxurious bunker. When the first ten pages of the top-secret manuscript appear online, the dream job becomes a nightmare.

name: Rammbock: Berlin Undead
summary_text: Just when Michael arrives in Berlin to visit his ex-girlfriend Gabi, a terrible virus starts spreading across the city at a rapid pace, turning people into mindless homicidal maniacs. Much ...                See full summary »

name: Nid de guêpes
summary_text: Alliances change when an armored car with an Albanian mafia boss prisoner escapes a mafia army by driving inside a warehouse, which is being robbed by a French gang stealing laptops etc.

name: Lassie
summary_text: When a family of 4 moves from Baltimore to a farm in rural Virginia, they adopt an abandoned collie. The dog becomes the son's companion and protector, helping him adapt to rural life.

name: The Day of the Locust
summary_text: An art director in the 1930s falls in love and attempts to make a young woman an actress despite Hollywood who wants nothing to do with her because of her problems with an estranged man and her alcoholic father.

name: Ki & Ka
summary_text: Follows a young, married couple whose relationship challenges the gender roles placed upon women and men in Indian society.

name: Judgementall Hai Kya
summary_text: Following the story of two quirky individuals whose lives pivot between reality and illusions.

name: Perfect Creature
summary_text: The vampire myth is given a stylish 1960s treatment, where a human cop partners with a vampire cop to stop a vamp bent on creating a war between the two "separate but equal" races.

name: This Property Is Condemned
summary_text: The dramatic love story of small-town Mississippi girl Alva Starr and railroad official Owen Legate, set during the Great Depression.

name: Bottom of the World
summary_text: The mysterious disappearance of a young woman leads her boyfriend on a journey for truth and perhaps his own unknown reality in this dark, hypnotic mystery that transcends the limitations of traditional narrative.

name: The Super
summary_text: Karma comes into play when a wealthy wisecracking landlord is ordered by a court to live in the filthy building that he runs.

name: 12 Rounds 2: Reloaded
summary_text: A man's kidnapped paramedic Nick's wife, forcing him on phone to play a "game of death" with 12 rounds, directing Nick to different locations.

name: Demon
summary_text: A bridegroom is possessed by an unquiet spirit in the midst of his own wedding celebration, in this clever take on the Jewish legend of the dybbuk.

name: Keane
summary_text: A disheveled man desperately searches New York City for his young daughter.

name: Moebius
summary_text: A father driven into desire, a son coveting that of his father's, and the sorrowful maternity that hovers them into tragedy.

name: Jerry Before Seinfeld
summary_text: Comedian Jerry Seinfeld takes the stage at the comedy club where he began his career to recount his early life.

name: Besharam
summary_text: A car thief falls in love with a woman whose car he has stolen.

name: Archangel
summary_text: A British college professor, working in Russia, investigates certain mysteries surrounding the life and death of Joseph Stalin.

name: The Serpent's Egg
summary_text: Berlin, 1923. Following the suicide of his brother, American circus acrobat Abel Rosenberg attempts to survive while facing unemployment, depression, alcoholism and the social decay of Germany during the Weimar Republic.

name: La veuve de Saint-Pierre
summary_text: In a small French colony, a drunken man kills someone. While a guillotine is being shipped in, he changes, becoming a good and popular man.

name: Longtime Companion
summary_text: The emergence and devastation of the AIDS epidemic is chronicled in the lives of several gay men living during the 1980s.

name: LSD: Love, Sex Aur Dhokha
summary_text: A video camcorder, a store security camera, and concealed cameras candidly expose lives in three loosely-linked tales.

name: Dhol
summary_text: Four lazy friends try to woo a rich girl, in order to live a wealthy lifestyle. Their plan, however goes horribly wrong after they get embroiled with a notorious criminal.

name: Neveroyatnye priklyucheniya italyantsev v Rossii
summary_text: The mad adventures of the mad Italians, searching for the mad treasures in the mad Russia.

name: Uncanny
summary_text: The world's first "perfect" Artificial Intelligence begins to exhibit startling and unnerving emergent behavior when a reporter begins a relationship with the scientist who created it.

name: Endless Poetry
summary_text: Surrealist filmmaker Alejandro Jodorowsky tells the story of himself as a young man becoming a poet in Chile, befriending other artists, and freeing himself from the limits of his youth.

name: Die Nibelungen: Siegfried
summary_text: Siegfried, son of King Sigmund, hears of the beautiful sister of Gunter, King of Worms, Kriemhild. On his way to Worms, he kills a dragon and finds a treasure, the Hort. He helps Gunther to...                See full summary »

name: Kasaba
summary_text: The story of a family living in a small godforsaken town in Turkey seen through the eyes of children and dealing with the growing complexity when one becomes an adult.

name: Oedipus Rex
summary_text: Rescued from abandonment and raised by the King and Queen, Oedipus is still haunted by a prophecy--he'll murder his father and marry his mother.

name: The Diabolical
summary_text: A single mother, and her children, are awoken nightly by an intense presence. She asks her scientist boyfriend to destroy the violent spirit, that paranormal experts are too frightened to take on.

name: Disgrace
summary_text: After having an affair with a student, a Cape Town professor moves to the Eastern Cape, where he gets caught up in a mess of post-apartheid politics.

name: Officer Down
summary_text: When a cop's crooked past comes back to get him, can he do the right thing, or will he succumb to the threats of his dangerous connections?

name: Unnaipol Oruvan
summary_text: A retiring police officer remembers a thrilling case of his life which is not recorded in any case files.

name: Idlewild
summary_text: At a sexy, sizzling nightclub, pianist Percival lives life by the rules, while Rooster, the club's flashy lead performer, struts his stuff on the stage. But all changes when greed, fame and murder threaten to destroy them and the joint.

name: Jalsaghar
summary_text: Depicts the end days of a decadent zamindar (landlord) in Bengal, and his efforts to uphold his family prestige even when faced with economic adversity.

name: Good Luck Charlie, It's Christmas!
summary_text: Idiocy strikes when a woman and her daughter get separated from their family during the holidays.

name: Merry Madagascar
summary_text: When Santa and his reindeer crash onto Madagascar it's up to Alex, Marty, Gloria, Melvin, and the penguins to save Christmas.

name: While at War
summary_text: Writer Miguel de Unamuno faces himself and his ideals after the 1936's military coup d'etat.

name: Comedy Central Roast of Charlie Sheen
summary_text: It's Charlie Sheen's turn to step in to the celebrity hot seat for the latest installment of The Comedy Central Roast.

name: De Heineken ontvoering
summary_text: A bold, amateur kidnapping goes wildly awry in this fictionalized account of beer magnate Alfred Heineken's 1983 abduction, which would go on to become one of The Netherlands' most infamous crimes.

name: Survive the Night
summary_text: A disgraced doctor and his family are held hostage at their home by criminals on the run, when a robbery-gone-awry requires them to seek immediate medical attention.

name: Kidnapping Stella
summary_text: Snatched off the street and held for ransom, a bound and gagged woman uses her limited powers to derail her two masked abductors' carefully laid plans.

name: Sorority Wars
summary_text: Starting college, Katie and her BFF Sara try to get into Delta sorority. Katie overhears something that splits her from Delta and Sara. Things get nasty and she joins Kappa.

name: The Spitfire Grill
summary_text: Oscar-winner Ellen Burstyn (The Exorcist) headlines this critically praised drama about a young woman, just out of prison, who finds spiritual redemption working at a cafe in Maine.

name: Dirty
summary_text: Two gangbangers-turned-cops try and cover up a scandal within the LAPD.

name: Cat Run
summary_text: When a sexy, high-end escort holds the key evidence to a scandalous government cover-up, two bumbling young detectives become her unlikely protectors from a ruthless assassin hired to silence her.

name: The Human Condition III: A Soldier's Prayer
summary_text: His ideals challenged by life as a conscript in war-time Japan's military, a pacifist faces ever greater tests in his fight for survival.

name: Center of My World
summary_text: After a summer spent with his his best friend Kat to escape his family, Phil goes back to school and starts to question his feelings towards Nicholas, a new classmate.

name: Schizopolis
summary_text: Fletcher Munson, the lethargic employee of a pseudo-religious self help company, and his doppelganger, the friendly but dull dentist Dr. Jeffrey Korchek.

name: Hellion
summary_text: When motocross and heavy metal obsessed thirteen-year-old Jacob's increasing delinquent behavior forces CPS to place his little brother, Wes, with his aunt, Jacob and his emotionally absent...                See full summary »

name: Bright Young Things
summary_text: An adaptation of Evelyn Waugh's novel "Vile Bodies", is a look into the lives of a young novelist, his would-be lover, and a host of young people who beautified London in the 1930s.

name: No News from God
summary_text: Two angels, one from the heaven and one from the hell, come to earth to save the soul of a boxer.

name: Cadence
summary_text: Charlie Sheen plays a rebellious inmate in an Army stockade.

name: Adults in the Room
summary_text: Greece in 2015: the economy is in tatters and the country is on the verge of bankruptcy. A new government rebels against the EU's iron-fisted rule and inspires millions of Europeans. Based on the political memoirs of Yanis Varoufakis.

name: Crime Spree
summary_text: A French gang of thieves flies over to Chicago for a one time job. However, things seem to get out of hand soon.

name: Kansen
summary_text: INFECTION takes place in a dark, isolated hospital, where one doctors mistake has led to dire consequences for a patient.

name: Solino
summary_text: In the sixties Romano Amato, his wife Rosa and their two sons Giancarlo and Gigi emigrate from Solino in Italy to Duisburg in the Ruhr area and establish the first Pizza restaurant in town....                See full summary »

name: Charulata
summary_text: The lonely wife of a newspaper editor falls in love with her visiting cousin-in-law, who shares her love for literature.

name: Kismat Konnection
summary_text: A luckless architect discovers a social activist to be his lucky charm. Unfortunately, she's protecting the community center he's aiming to win a contract to tear down.

name: Just Before Dawn
summary_text: Five young people venture into the backwoods of Oregon to claim a property, and find themselves being stalked by a hulking, machete-wielding psychopath.

name: All Roads Lead to Rome
summary_text: Maggie is an uptight, single mother and college writing teacher from New York City. In an effort to reconnect with her troubled teen daughter Summer, she decides to embark on a journey to a...                See full summary »

name: Hatsukoi
summary_text: A young boxer and a call girl get caught up in a drug-smuggling scheme over the course of one night in Tokyo.

name: Bet on Revenge
summary_text: Ernõ Blaskovich lost everything after the Hungarian Revolution of 1848. Kincsem, a magnificent horse gives a purpose of his meaningless, self-destructing life. He gets a chance to gain everything back: revenge, love and fame.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Lord Slug
summary_text: A Super Namekian named Slug comes to invade Earth.

name: Herbie Goes Bananas
summary_text: The adorable little VW helps its owners break up a counterfeiting ring in Mexico.

name: Dark Planet
summary_text: A space traveler from the Earth of the 22th century - without wars, poverty and oppression - crashes on an unknown planet. Politically and economically that planet similar to the totalitarian human states of the 20th century.

name: Tokatçi
summary_text: A tragicomedy dramatizing how an innocent villager is driven into the crime world only to collect enough cash to make his biggest dream come true: Return to his village home and marry the girl next door.

name: Walking Tall
summary_text: Based on the life of Tennessee sheriff Buford Pusser whom almost single-handily cleaned up his small town of crime and corruption, but at a personal cost of his family life and nearly his own life.

name: A Quiet Passion
summary_text: The story of American poet Emily Dickinson from her early days as a young schoolgirl to her later years as a reclusive, unrecognized artist.

name: Career Girls
summary_text: 2 young women reunite and rekindle their friendship after having said goodbye at their college graduation, six years earlier.

name: Greed
summary_text: Satire about the world of the super-rich.

name: Chuck & Buck
summary_text: An oddly naive man-child stalks his childhood best friend and tries to reconnect with their past.

name: Already Tomorrow in Hong Kong
summary_text: An attraction forms when a Chinese American girl visiting Hong Kong for the first time meets an American expat who shows her the way, but timing may not quite be on their side. A ...                See full summary »

name: Yüz Numarali Adam
summary_text: A poor young man chosen by a advertising company, and they made him a public hero to make him advertise poor quality products that no one buy.

name: Raising Victor Vargas
summary_text: A Lower East Side teen-ager struggles to find some sanity while surrounded by an eccentric grandmother, a crazy new girlfriend, and a longing younger brother.

name: Judwaa
summary_text: Twin brothers who are separated soon after birth, meet in adulthood and join forces to defeat their common enemy, a notorious criminal.

name: Victim
summary_text: A closeted lawyer risks his career to bring a blackmailer to justice.

name: The Westerner
summary_text: Judge Roy Bean, a self-appointed hanging judge in Vinegarroon, Texas, befriends saddle tramp Cole Harden, who opposes Bean's policy against homesteaders.

name: Wish You Were Here
summary_text: Two Australian couples, two sisters, are on vacation in Southern Cambodia. Jeremy goes missing. What happened? Were drugs involved? Secrets are slowly revealed after the 3 return to Sydney.

name: Love & Sex
summary_text: Kate's fired from a women's magazine for writing about BJs, based on own experience as requested. She gets a last chance - 2500 happy, perky words on finding/keeping that perfect man. She tells about her relationships.

name: Atithi Tum Kab Jaoge?
summary_text: A couple's married life is turned upside down when a distant relative overstay in their home.

name: Seven Beauties
summary_text: The defense of honor, a strong value in Neapolitan society, and its effects on the life of everyman Pasquale Frafuso.

name: Azhar
summary_text: Biographical sports drama based on the life of former Indian international cricketer, Mohammad Azharuddin

name: Far from the Madding Crowd
summary_text: Bathsheba Everdene, a willful, flirtatious, young woman, unexpectedly inherits a large farm and is romantically pursued by three very different men.
